name: Daddy (itch)
description:
Welcome to Daddy!

Daddy is a family friendly baseball game about father and son bonding. In Daddy, you play as Shnozz - a 10 year old boy who loves his bat a bit too much. With your golden ticket, set out on an adventure to play some ball with ol' pops. Encounter interesting characters along the way. All of this and more in the hit indie game, Daddy!

Credits:

Robby - Kinda did everything

Vlad - Kinda did everything too + music
